markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hydraulic Deflection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2299) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Drawing moisture from the atmosphere, you create a disc of hovering water that deflects attacks. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
name: Hydraulic Deflection
